resources.string: Ongoing conference call. Join as voice or video.
Cannot start the call, please try later
"Due to missing permissions, some features may be missing..
You need permission to invite to start a conference in this room
Set a password to your bug report
You seem to be shaking the phone in frustration. Would you like to submit a bug report?
There are unsaved changes. Leaving will discard them.
User names may only contain letters, numbers, dots, hyphens and underscores
This email address is already defined.
If you don\'t specify an email address, you won\'t be able to reset your password. Are you sure?
Please check your email to continue registration
This Home Server would like to make sure you are not a robot
I have verified my email address
To reset your password, enter the email address linked to your account:
The email address linked to your account must be entered.
A new password must be entered.
An email has been sent to %s. Once you\'ve followed the link it contains, click below.
Failed to verify email address: make sure you clicked the link in the email
Your email address does not appear to be associated with a Matrix ID on this Homeserver.
Your password has been reset.\n\nYou have been logged out of all devices and will no longer receive push notifications. To re-enable notifications, re-log in on each device.
Unable to register : email ownership failure
We failed to retrieve authentication information from this Home Server
Currently we do not support any or all login flows defined by this Home Server
The access token specified was not recognised
Too many requests have been sent
This user name is already used
The email link which has not been clicked yet
You are trying to access a room.
Would you like to join in order to participate in the discussion?
You have been invited to join this room by %s
Would you like to accept or decline this invitation?
This invitation was sent to %s which is not associated with this account.\nYou may wish to login with a different account, or add this email to your this account.
All notifications are currently disabled for all devices.

Notification settings are saved to your user account and are shared between all clients which support them (including desktop notifications).

Rules are applied in order; the first rule which matches defines the outcome for the message.
So: Per-word notifications are more important than per-room notifications which are more important than per-sender notifications.
For multiple rules of the same kind, the first one in the list that matches takes priority.

Words match case insensitively, and may include a * wildcard. So:
foo matches the string foo surrounded by word delimiters (e.g. punctuation and whitespace or start/end of line).
foo* matches any such word that begins foo.
*foo* matches any such word which includes the 3 letters foo.
Notify me with sound about messages that contain my user name
Notify me with sound about messages that contain my display name
Notify me with sound about messages sent just to me
Notify me when I am invited to a new room
Notify me when people join or leave rooms
Notify me when I receive a call

The following commands are available in the room chat:

 /nick <display_name>: change your display name
 /me <action>: send the action you are doing. /me will be replaced by your display name
 /join <room_alias>: join a room
 /kick <user_id> [<reason>]: kick the user
 /ban <user_id> [<reason>]: ban the user
 /unban <user_id>: unban the user
 /op <user_id> <power_level>: set user power level
 /deop <user_id>: reset user power level to the room default value
The remote side failed to pick up.
Take a picture or a video"
You are about to be asked to grant permissions..
%s needs access to media files to display photos in the media picker or to store your medias.\n\n
%s needs access to the camera to take pictures, video calls..
%s needs access to the microphone to perform audio calls
Your address book emails are uploaded for discovering matrix IDs.
Your address book emails are uploaded for discovering matrix IDs.\nAllow %s to access your contacts ?
Sorry.. Action not performed, due to missing permissions
You have been invited to join this room by %s
This is a preview of this room. Files and other attachments have been disabled.
This invitation was sent to %s, which is not associated with this account.\nYou may wish to login with a different account, or add this email to your this account.
You are trying to access %s. Would you like to join in order to participate in the discussion?
This is a preview of this room. Room interactions have been disabled.
Are you sure you want to make this chat public? Anyone can read your messages and join the chat.
Are you sure you want to leave the room?
Are you sure you want to remove %s from this chat?
Hide all messages from this user
Show all messages from this user
You will not be able to undo this change as you are promoting the user to have the same power level as yourself.\nAre you sure?
Connectivity to the server has been lost.
You do not have permission to post to this room
Could not verify identity of remote server.
This could mean that someone is maliciously intercepting your traffic, or that your phone does not trust the certificate provided by the remote server.
If the server administrator has said that this is expected, ensure that the fingerprint below matches the fingerprint provided by them.
The certificate has changed from one that was trusted by your phone. This is HIGHLY UNUSUAL. It is recommended that you DO NOT ACCEPT this new certificate.
The certificate has changed from a previously trusted one to one that is not trusted. The server may have renewed its certificate. Contact the server administrator for the expected fingerprint.
ONLY accept the certificate if the server administrator has published a fingerprint that matches the one above.
Fail to update the room name
The updates will be lost : are you sure to leave ?
Malformed ID. Should be an email address or a Matrix ID like \'@localpart:domain\'
Do you want to hide all messages from this user?
Turn the screen on for 3 seconds
When i\'m invited to a room
Please check your email and click on the link it contains. Once this is done, click continue.
Unable to verify email address. Please check your email and click on the link it contains. Once this is done, click continue
List this room in room directory
Members only (since the point in time of selecting this option)
To link to a room it must have an address.
Only people who have been invited
Anyone who knows the room\'s link, apart from guests
Anyone who knows the room\'s link, including guests
These are experimental features that may break in unexpected ways. Use with caution.
You need to logout to be able to enable the encryption.
This room has no local addresses
\'%s\' is not a valid format for an alias
You will have no main address specified. The default main address for this room will be picked randomly"
Encryption is enabled in this room.
Enable encryption \n(warning: cannot be disabled again!)
Warning!\nEnd-to-end encryption is in beta and may not be reliable.
Do you accept to help us to improve the application behaviour and to send crash reports ?
You need to restart the application to disable the crash reports.
%s was trying to load a specific point in this room\'s timeline but was unable to find it.

To verify that this device can be trusted, please contact its owner using some other means (e.g. in person or a phone call) and ask them whether the key they see in their User Settings for this device matches the key below:

If it matches, press the verify button below. If it doesnt, then someone else is intercepting this device and you probably want to press the block button instead.\nIn future this verification process will be more sophisticated.
I verify that the keys match
